subject: Golf
Advertising and Marketing
Movies
lead_paragraph: To shake golf out of its slow-playing doldrums, the U.S.G.A. will unveil a campaign celebrating “Caddyshack,” the 1980 movie that lampooned golf’s stuffy country club reputation.
snippet: To shake golf out of its slow-playing doldrums, the U.S.G.A. will unveil a campaign celebrating “Caddyshack,” the 1980 movie that lampooned golf’s stuffy country club reputation.
